function.name: read_file
function.description: Read the contents of a file from the filesystem

file_path.description: The path to the file to read, e.g., '/home/user/config.txt'

start_line.description: Optional: Line number to start reading from (1-indexed)

num_lines.description: Optional: Number of lines to read. If not specified, reads entire file

function.name: write_file
function.description: Write content to a file, creating it if it doesn't exist or overwriting if it does

file_path.description: The path to the file to write to

content.description: The content to write to the file

append.description: If true, append to the file instead of overwriting. Default is false

function.name: list_directory
function.description: List all files and directories in a given directory path

directory_path.description: The path to the directory to list, e.g., '/home/user' or '.'

recursive.description: If true, list files recursively in subdirectories. Default is false

pattern.description: Optional: Filter results by file pattern, e.g., '*.py' or '*.json'

function.name: replace_line
function.description: Replace or modify a specific line in a file

file_path.description: The path to the file to modify

new_content.description: The new content for the line

function.name: get_line
function.description: Get a specific line or range of lines from a file to view or edit

context_lines.description: Optional: Number of lines before and after to include for context. Default is 0
